title: How Innovative Grafting Technique can change the agriculture forever.

tasks.task: Understand and explain a new grafting technique for monocot plants.
subtasks: Identify the scientist and their team's achievement.
Describe the process of grafting used in the technique.
Explain the compatibility of the new method with various monocot plants.
Discuss the application of the technique to protect Cavendish bananas from Panama disease.
Emphasize the significance of the technique in agriculture and plant health.
